alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 15 at 3:25AM AKDT until May 16 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKDT TONIGHT FOR DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR EASTERN ALASKA RANGE... * AFFECTED AREA...Eastern Alaska Range. * TIMING...Now to 12 AM Monday night. * WINDS...South 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 30 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Around 40. * IMPACTS...Rapid Ignition, growth and spread of fires are possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
